chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 12 mini is experiencing the following issue:
Hello, I need an invoice that displays the IMEI number, the identity of the person using my phone COULIBALY Layala. In addition to existing information. Thank you in advance.

Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile,

The customer would like to have his invoice with the IMEI number and would like his son's name (COULIBALY Layala) to appear on the invoice, specifying that he is the user in addition to his name on the invoice.
She wants it for her insurer because the phone is broken.

Regards,
Affoue-Clotilde-Sonia from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

I have attached the updated invoice in this message. Please do let me know if the customer still has any other issues. Thank you.

Regards,
CH
